alert.note: Alert for Canon City Vicinity, Eastern Fremont County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued October 23 at 2:49PM MDT until October 24 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM MDT MONDAY... ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE MONDAY NIGHT THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 29 will result in frost formation. For the Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 29 possible. * WHERE...eastern Fremont County. * WHEN...For the Frost Advisory, from midnight tonight to 9 AM MDT Monday. For the Freeze Watch, from late Monday night through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Canon City Vicinity, Eastern Fremont County
